classic.name: Parco Nazionale delle Cinque Terre
classic.description: Brightly colored fishing villages perch at the foot of sea cliffs on this protected coastline.

classic.name: Castello di Riomaggiore
classic.description: Built in 1260, with additions in the 15th & 16th centuries, this stone castle perches above the sea.

classic.name: Sentiero Monterosso - Vernazza
classic.description: Scenic hiking trail connecting the Cinque Terre, with expansive ocean views & lush landscapes.

classic.name: Naval Technical Museum La Spezia
classic.description: Small naval history museum showcasing cannons, guns & other artillery, plus model ships.
classic.address: Viale Giovanni Amendola, 1, 19121 La Spezia SP, Italy

classic.name: Castello San Giorgio
classic.description: 14th-century hilltop castle with exhibits of sculptures & other artifacts, plus town & port views.
classic.address: Via XXVII Marzo, 36, 19121 La Spezia SP, Italy

classic.name: Castello di Vernazza
classic.description: Hilltop castle dating to around 1,000 CE, reached by steep stairs & offering sweeping views.

classic.name: Spiaggia Levanto
classic.description: Sandy strip backed by bars & trattorias, in view of green hills dotted with villas.
classic.address: Passeggiata a Mare, 4, 19015 Levanto SP, Italy

classic.name: Parrocchia di S. Giovanni Battista
classic.description: 14th-century church featuring a Gothic facade with white & black marble stripes & a rose window.
classic.address: Via Roma, 12, 19016 Monterosso al Mare SP, Italy
